page.title: 17NON-CONFORMIST CHURCHES
page.content:
{Baptist Church,Stocksfield Minister Revd. Andrew Fitz-Gibbon Present church built 1905 from materials of earlier church at Broomley built 1837. Sunday Services: 10.45am, 6.30pm Afternoon Sunday School. Church activities,Thursday Club,Boys' Brigade,Mums' Club,Holiday Club. {Methodist Church,High Mickley Minister Revd.M.Malcolm Adams Built 1906. During last 20 years three Methodist churches in area have closed two in Mickley, one at Hedley. Sunday Services: 6pm. Sunday School 10.30am {Methodist Church,Branch End.} Built 1903 Minister Revd. Ivor Haywood Sunday Service 6pm.
{CLASS PROJECT edited by Stanley Batey
